title: The Genie from downunder. - Vol. 5.
creator_credit: Esben Storm, Jeremy Swan, Phil Jones, Patricia Edgar and Australian Children's Television Foundation
brief_description: In a ‘Tale of two cities’, Conrad works out that Bruce and Baz are genies and tries to learn more about their secret powers. In ‘School daze’ Penelope wishes herself back in England to avoid having to go to school in Australia and finds that she has to sit a “catch up” exam at her school when she returns.
creator_credit_for_label: Esben Storm, Jeremy Swan, Phil Jones, Patricia Edgar and Australian Children’s Television Foundation
